treatment-md.title: Arachnospila (Arachnospila) clericalis Morawitz 1889
treatment-md.article-title: Review of the nominotypical subgenus of Arachnospila Kincaid (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae) of Russia and neighbouring countries with the lectotypification of enigmatic Pompilus sogdianus Morawitz and description of new species
